website_summaries.verdict: Lindt chocolates have a reputation for quality, and this advent calendar is very child-friendly.
pros: Contains 31 assorted pieces of quality Lindt chocolate
cons: Chocolate pieces may be past their prime or hollow

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what was listed a totally different assortment not as fancy. Not worth the money! Lindt was supposed to have 10.8 grams of candy and the one sent had 4.8 grams! No Santa included just a teddy bear. Amazon was lovely and refunded the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schouten

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be lured in by the name Lindt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I trusted chocolates from the well known Lindt. Expiration date was in 4 months so I assumed they were still fresh. The chocolates one by one were old, had a dry and whitish film to them and they were mostly all hollow! The few that were solid which I expected all of them to be, leaked a weird oil that came through the wrappers. By the time I reached the tenth day, I couldn’t bare them any longer and threw the calendar out. So I wasted money on an expense mine field full of repulsive chocolates! Sad
customer_reviews.author: Muriel V.H.

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive at best
customer_reviews.text: This was filled with doubles and triples of the same hollow figures and milk chocolate truffles. Lindt has so many products youd think you could at least get different types of the truffles even. Nope. All the red ones. I do these calendars every year. This one I did Lindt and a wine one. Will never purchase a lindt one again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: it's a huge box of chocolate
customer_reviews.text: i've bought other advent calendars and was disappointed in the taste and amount of chocolate. this one is worth the price. it didn't take very long to get here. i am ready for december 1st. i love the lead up to christmas and this really helps it is delicious chocolate. i am so glad i bought this advent calendar
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lehnert

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff Period!
customer_reviews.text: This Chocolate advent calendar is not worth $34 by a long shot. There is next to nothing in it, only cheap thin chocolates. What a waste of money. I wish it would be returnable just as a matter of principle.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent Calendar on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve experimented with over 10 advent calendars on Amazon, over the past 4 years. This is hands down the greatest quality, taste and value! The box itself is very sturdy and beautifully designed. The chocolate pieces are a good size, thick and creamy. I’ve sent so many advent calendars as gifts, and all recipients have loved them and made similar comments! I truly think they taste better than the Godiva Advent Calendars, and are nearly 1/3 the price! I will definitely be ordering this every year. Dear Lindt: Please don’t stop making them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best advent calendar I've ever purchased and the extra cost is sooo worth it!! The candies are quite large, some are filled - not just solid chocolate AND they are beautifully wrapped! My grandsons couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3 year old's first Christmas Advent calendar. He loved it! I loved the fact that the candy was a very good quality chocolate, not the icky waxy cheap kind. He was so excited to open a new compartment each morning to see what the special surprise would be. He also liked matching his candy to the pictures on the back of the calendar...
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but SOOO worth it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but so worth it. Not those cheap chocolates that taste waxy. Christmas countdown is a magical time in our house, and these were such a big hit with my kids. Big super tasty chocolate treats that even mom and dad wanted a bite of... I would highly recommend it for your children or grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: NSM

customer_reviews.title: You gotta buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar was the best one I’ve seen! It has separate compartments for each day so that the chocolates don’t shift around in the packaging!!! It was very well made and I plan to buy them again next holiday season - for all of my nieces and nephews and for my neighbors as holiday gifts too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and the Godiva one for me - next year I'm getting two Lindt calendars. Much more chocolate than the other and a nice big calendar. 4 stars only because most of the chocolates are hollow.
customer_reviews.author: hitalia

customer_reviews.title: Great chocolates, fun family tradition continues
customer_reviews.text: I got this for both the boys (11yrs old) to share. They take turns opening the days. They love the chocolates and the shapes that comes out. If I had to do it again, I probably wouldn't get this to share. Some days are bigger chocolates than the others, sometimes there are two in one. So far no fights have broken out over it though :) Tis the season!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Brackenridge

customer_reviews.title: My adult daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: A nice treat of delicious candy each day during the Christmas season. Buy one for yourself too.
customer_reviews.author: James Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Mmm. When getting a Lindor ball is actually a little disappointing, that’s saying something!
customer_reviews.author: Peter S. Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (and I) were blown away by the quality of this calendar. We try different ones each year and this one is a keeper! Very substantial and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelle McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Kids won’t forget this!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pricey but sooo impressive! Get this every year for my grandkids!
customer_reviews.author: Robin B.

customer_reviews.title: Premium Advent calendar chocolate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter truly loved the bedtime ritual of getting a chocolate from the Advent calendar. She is counting the days until Christmas again, as it is her favorite season. Was it the presents? Family? Chocolate?
customer_reviews.author: Sean Dunn

customer_reviews.title: The Best Advent Calendar!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves advent calendars. This exceeded my expectation. I had no idea how big it was. My daughter lived it with good size pieces of good chocolate!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful Advent calendar. The chocolates are delicious. I will purchase this one again!
customer_reviews.author: CNHens

customer_reviews.title: Best chocolate!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best chocolate in an advent calendar. Actually, full size pieces. Will never buy any other advent calendar!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gault

customer_reviews.title: taste like cardboard
customer_reviews.text: the calendar is very pretty but the actual chocolate candies are pretty tasteless. Cheap, cardboard-like milk chocolate. Tasted like nothing at all, very atypical for Lindt.
customer_reviews.author: Person from the USA

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My parents thoroughly enjoyed this- they alternated days and often shared the chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Only received 1.  Ordered a 10pk
customer_reviews.text: This item was sold as a 10pk. I received 1 individual item with stickers all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chocolate and so pretty
customer_reviews.text: Amazing chocolate and so pretty! This is one of the biggest advent calendars that I have ever seen and the chocolate is delicious
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get ready for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my children and they all loved them.
customer_reviews.author: hardworker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: These advent calendars are the best we've ever had!!!! My husband and I each get advent calendars every year and we decided to try Lindt this year. These did not disappoint. We have already decided that this is the only advent calendar that we will buy from now on. Wonderful!!!! And well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get an advent calendar and this one didn't disappoint!! The chocolate was good and everyday was something different! We will be getting more next year :)
customer_reviews.author: GcD

customer_reviews.title: but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The first day's chocolate (December 1) were missing. Not sure if other boxes are empty as well, but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat 🐈

customer_reviews.title: shapes and beautifully foil wrapped chocolates are making every day exciting for ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids are loving this! All the different sizes, shapes and beautifully foil wrapped chocolates are making every day exciting for them. I was a bit concerned about the price but now that I've seen whats inside and the joy it brings, its worth it to me. The trouffle was a big hit !! I will be ordering this next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate tasted great but there was a lack of variety
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate tasted great but there was a lack of variety. For a chocolatier that offers a plethora of different chocolates, some extra variation would have been expected.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Advent calendar that makes kids happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend of mine and Lindt is always a great choice. She and her kids are happy about the advent calendars as they are making waiting for Christmas a wonderful and yummy experience. Thanks Lindt!
customer_reviews.author: TofuBeast

customer_reviews.title: Lindt Advent Calander
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful calendar. The chocolate inside is wonderful as usual. There is anything from chocolate balls to a 3 inch Santa in it. They are all wrapped in aluminum foil.
customer_reviews.author: jaxmike

customer_reviews.title: My kid is obsessed with this. Chocolates are different ...
customer_reviews.text: My kid is obsessed with this. Chocolates are different each day and some are quite large (e.g. a santa or angel figurine).
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: A little more expensive than cheap chocolate but soooooo worth it.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: but it would really be fun for any age chocolate lover
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how large it was. My son loves it, but it would really be fun for any age chocolate lover!
customer_reviews.author: Min K. Goodspeed

customer_reviews.title: Best chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved the size of the Lindt chocolates! They got a nice surprise each day!
customer_reviews.author: Geanine

customer_reviews.title: Yummy chocolate for an older, almost adult child.
customer_reviews.text: Yummy chocolate for an older, almost adult child. The box is well made and able to withstand being hung by a nail to the wall
customer_reviews.author: Karina C. Kness-kuhl

customer_reviews.title: it was fun having to search for the door numbers and you ...
customer_reviews.text: Delicious candy, it was fun having to search for the door numbers and you just can't beat having a some Lindt chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Nay Hubb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Quality chocolate advent calendar, will be buying the same one next year!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend is new to Christmas and has a chocolate addiction, so I got her this to get in the spirit. Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best advent calendar I have ever bought, the chocolate taste amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We didn't buy one ourselves, but bought them for relatives as gifts, and were appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: sonshines

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons enjoyed this product.
customer_reviews.text: Gifts for grandsons ages 7-13. Pieces were good size Candy was delicious. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful treat!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best advent calendar. The chocolates are varied and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of nice candy, but a few had white film.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesewhiz

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but definitely worth it...
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a Cadbury advent calendar, but then upgraded to Lindt. Definitely worth it despite the price.
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with these wonderful treats.
customer_reviews.text: The calendars make great Christmas gifts and are just right for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Pound

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Loooove! Didn't realize how huge this is. Which is wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Christmas season must have!
customer_reviews.text: My 19 year old son said it was the best chocolate he’s ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worth it to pay a little extra to get the lindt brand over the cheap advent calendars
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular, cant wait for Dec 1st to open the first one!
customer_reviews.author: CARLI WESTCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: High quality candy, My daughter love opening up each day.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chocolate, fun for my kids to open during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Adults and Children!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who had never heard of an Advent Calendar. He had so much fun opening and receiving his treat each day. I guess one is never too old to extend the magic of Christmas and the candies were superb!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have some pretty old looking chocolate in there some days. Still a great selection - just overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Katja Loeffler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (4 yrs old) loved it and he only likes high quality chocolate ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L. Sones

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Chocolates are large and delicious. Box is decorated with great art. Delivered quickly with Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: James O

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent Calendar Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best chocolate advent calendars that we have ever had. My son loves it! There is a good variety of high quality chocolates.
customer_reviews.author: William of the Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: Cute graphics but very old stale chocolate. Even my 5 year old decided she didn't want to open any more days after having the first few pieces,
customer_reviews.author: A. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wife loved it, getting a present everyday. The chocolate was amazing, large pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mayorga

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present ever
customer_reviews.text: 91 yr old great-Grampa living in a nursing home shared EVERYday with 2 yr old great-grandson. Best Christmas present ever! Great chocolates! Made Christmas special!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my girlfriend since she loved getting these as a kid
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my girlfriend since she loved getting these as a kid. So far its day 6 and she has gotten different chocolates everyday and some were huge! Great buy, will get next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids thought this was great - puts the fun back into Christmas and
customer_reviews.text: My kids thought this was great - puts the fun back into Christmas and, as a bonus, the chocolate is really, really good.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely large pieces of chocolate, I will buy again for Christmas this year
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: this is soooo good. chocolates are different and various sizes sometimes 2 in one door. My kids alternate days they get to open a door, yes that's right people who are all concerned about having 2 kids with one calendar. Teach your kids to be patient and to be happy for their sibling!
customer_reviews.author: hlhs mama

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good advent calendar, actual chocolates as opposed to the little nibs of chocolate you usually get
customer_reviews.author: Sam Miller

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed- Melted
customer_reviews.text: Chocolates were melted lumps...very disappointing. This should have been a good quality because it is Lindt and it was expensive.
customer_reviews.author: fnljz

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for the amount of chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Actual chocolate inside is far less than I would have expected for the price. Tiny pieces, and they repeat. Make your own advent calendar and save money.
customer_reviews.author: astrabidastra

customer_reviews.title: For name brand chocolate - forget the retail stores
customer_reviews.text: The girlfriend absolutely loved it! She said it was some of the freshest chocolate she'd ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: YUMMMMMMMM
customer_reviews.text: Great Chocolate. I did not make it to Germany this year, so we needed to special order this to keep our family tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Life 2018

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate was delicious and fresh! My family enjoyed it so much we'll definitely get one when Christmas comes around next year!
customer_reviews.author: P. E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Be careful..... now that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful.....now that I have sppiled my daughter with this calendar, I don't think I could ever go back to regular cheap ones with flimsy artificial little bits of chocolate. Gourmet and the chocolates are big! She looked forward to opening each day and even sometimes shared!! :)
customer_reviews.author: nicole tarnowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Chocolate and entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 boys that get Lego advent calendars every year and 1 son that likes chocolate. I don't like buying him the $5 boring chocolate advent calendars, so I tried this one this year. It's Lindt chocolate, so it tastes very good. I also like that the shapes are mixed up and not just square or balls of chocolate. However, we were puzzled why Santa came so early in the month. It was like the 6th or something. Why not come on Christmas Eve? Strange. I'll still buy it again next year even though it's a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: D. Haupt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The chocolates in this advent calendar were repetitive and boring, some were even old looking. My son wasnt impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoyed the treats and countdown to Christmas! Chocolates were delicious and did not disappoint. Fun way to celebrate....
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: For the price we paid I expected way better. On the plus side amazon did an instant ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly when we received this advent calendar the chocolate had melted and then rehardened with a white film over every piece we opened. We made it to day 8 and now my daughter has just tossed the whole thing away. For the price we paid I expected way better. On the plus side amazon did an instant refund....but that really doesn't make up for my daughter not having an advent calendar while my other two children get to enjoy theirs.
customer_reviews.author: dunbar0430

customer_reviews.title: While lindt chocolate is tasty this was a disappointment for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is not a true advent calendar. Sunday advent started on Nov 27th but this calendar only has 24 chocolates. Plus there isn't even a chocolate for on Christmas Day. While lindt chocolate is tasty this was a disappointment for the cost. I actually could have bought a couple of bags of lindt chocolate for this price.
customer_reviews.author: kristy craig

customer_reviews.title: Fun Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the pleasure of actually eating the chocolate but my four girls have not complained. Very cute wrapped choc. behind each window.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Lacy

product_meta.title: Lindt Holiday Assorted Chocolate Advent Calendar, Great for Holiday Gifting, 10.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: Unwrap every day in December with chocolate joy! Each calendar holds a festive assortment of novelty chocolates including Santa, Snowman, seal, icicle, Penguin, Angel and star figures in milk chocolate, white chocolate and hazelnut.
feature_bullets: Kick off the holiday season in the sweetest way! This calendar is sure to delight children and adults alike.
Lindt delivers a unique chocolate experience offering a distinctly smooth and rich, gourmet taste
Lindt Chocolate embodies the passion and expert craftsmanship of its Lindt Master Swiss Chocolatiers
Great for holiday sharing and gifting
